this game is good.
buy black mesa instead

It is just like Half-Life 1 but with Source Engine (like Half-life 2), and very small changes. The storyline is the same, there is some bugs and glitches in the game but it doesnt harm the gameplay. Its possible to beat it. I got through it and beaten it so if you are worried about them, dont worry its possible to get through it. Just remember also to save wisely in case if you do encounter them and if you save in a spot where you are stuck, load the previous save file before it.
Я конечно понимаю бизнес, деньги, все дела,,,Но зачем платить дважды за тот же Half-Life с не очень большими улучшениями  в графе?

Que decir de este juego, una auténtica pasada, ya no se cuantas veces lo habré jugado para recordarlo de lo que me gustó.
Los gráficos de la época, claro está, por muy remasterizado que esté, pero la historia es impresionante y sólo por ello merece la pena.
El que no lo haya jugado, no se a que está esperando.
Great revamp of the classic Half Life. It features improved models, textures and added sound effects.
please do not get, i reccomend the original half-life, this one will mess up your games, it inverts alt and shift

This is one of my favorite games ever. everyone should play it at some time or another. I even prefer it to the beloved sequel because it nails the claustrophobic atmosphere. the game boasts a breaking bad esque soundtrack that kicks in only when it needs to. It is a compelling gameplay expirience with a minimalistic yet effective narritive. the main character gordan freeman is infinately relateable and the player is invested in his survival. The game doesn't have very many characters but the ones it does have are well developed.the ending is possibly my favorite part because it leaves the player SOO pumped for the next one. the updated physics engine is just icing on the already fantastic cake
A good excuse to play Half-Life again.
I highly recommend this game
Que piuedo decir ya todos lo conocen lo recomiendo
(G)old

毫无诚意的作品。
建模，光影，贴图几乎完全没有改进这都不说了，就连简单的加上对话字幕都没有，我都怀疑这游戏做出来是不是纯粹为了圈钱。
老版本尽管画面不怎么样，但是整体画面看起来还是十分的协调。换了source引擎后，建模，光阴却毫无改善，就让人感到浓浓的劣质感。
这游戏是买v社大包送的，要是想单独买就真心不推荐
classic, better visuals, fun, no bugs, gordan freeman

It's Half Life, but in the Source engine. If you've played Half Life, there's no reason to play this one. The expansions Blue Shift and Opposing Force also won't work if you have HLSOURCE and not HL, so I'd you're looking to pick one or the other, I'd recommend Half Life: not source.

Simply put,half life 1 in the source engine.Thats it. not a bad game by any stretch of the imagination,but some flaws.

PROS:Its half life
          Still amazing 
          Can select chapters
          better lighting

CONS:same price as half life
           nothing new
           Same Assets
           certain fights easier due to new water effects

recomend the game,but only get this version if you are a fan or buying a bundle with it in it

Esto no es una remasterización como las que hay ahora (Aunque las que hay ahora tampoco son para sorprenderse), no mejora nada las texturas, pero si se nota que utiliza el motor gráfico source, no te compres este juego si ya completaste el otro, pero si es la primera vez que lo juegas y quieres pasártelo, puedes optar por este. (O por Black Mesa)
отличное переиздание. графика изменена ровно настолько, чтобы не был утрачен дух оригинала. сейчас играется с интересом и даже восторгом.

Same as Half Life but with better graphics and gameplay! No bugs!! if you want to enjoy half life buy this version, wouldn't recommend Black mesa because of the ending which is missing!

Mit Half-Life: Source erhält man eine grafisch etwas aufpolierte und verbesserte Version des originalen Half-Life.
Die Story und das Gameplay haben sich nicht verändert. Man bekommt alles, was man vom Original kennt.
Solltet ihr euch diesen Klassiker zulegen wollen, könnt ihr getrost direkt auf diese Version zurückgreifen.

[b]9/10 - may Gaben be with you.[/b]

Hey, it's Half-Life. It was ahead of its time when it was released, but has it aged well? In terms of mechanics, not really. Graphics? Meh. The story, however - holy shit! I forgot how much I loved this game, and loved it with good reason too. The story is nothing short of amazing, and it's pretty obvious why people are begging for an edition to wrap everything up.

If you want to get into the series, HL: Source is the way to go. Updated physics and a few graphical changes may not mean the biggest difference in the world, but it's enough to get noticed.

Are there things I'd argue are flawed? Sure - but overall the plot is so enjoyable that you'll accept the game's age for what it is and still have a great time.
Just the original Half Life with new effects, prettier water and x10 buggier. You'd be better off buying the original HL1 for mod support and a better overall experience.

Estamos Falando de Algo que foi a Base de Todos FPs do Mundo!. Pois HL1 foi Algo que Revolucionou o Mundo dos Games. Uma Mistura de QUIVER e PROSPERO (Planos da Valve) No Game você se Passa na Pele do Gordon Freeman, Um Cientista Cujo Entreu e uma Encrenca da Pesada, Ao Fazer Parte de um Experimento da Black Mesa onde deu Errado. Pouco Depois Aliens de Outra Dimensão Aparecem na BM E seu Objetivo é Fugir do Laboratorio.    O Jogo Contem Diversas Armas, E diversos Tipos de Aliens. O Game Não é Rapetitivo. E Poucas Partes tem Uma SondTrack e uma musica. MAS quando tem São Otímas. Mais Detalhes Podem ser Encontrados ao Zerar o Game. Muito Obrigado e Esse Foi Meu Review  :D

Do not buy this game (unless you have money to waste). Valve did not even try to recreate Half-Life, This is Half-Life 1998 ported over to Source creating more glitches. The only difference is that the radiation and water looks realistic compared to the original, apart from that its just a more glitchy version. For the best experience, buy the 1998 version or the BLACK MESA version.

Сверхчувствительное управление крайне затрудняет прохождение и выматывает. Геймплейно игра скучна и однообразна, интерес приносит только дизайн локаций. Субтитры не работают, озвучка весьма посредственного качества. В общем, если вы не ярый фанат серии, поберегите нервы - теперь есть "Black Mesa".

Reviewing this is kind of awkward because it's basically Half Life 1 with better looking water and chapter selection. Biggest knocks against it would have to be the new glitches, lack of gibs, and lack of extensive support for mods. If you want the original vanilla Half Life 1 experience, buy the original Half Life 1, or alternatively, if you want a true remake, just get Black Mesa instead. Both are great.

Yes, the game does have some bugs, most notably music cutting out when loading a new area and the background glitch in one area (seen in the screenshot below), but it's still a fun game. My only criticism is that there were a few parts that were really difficult, during which I died a lot, but since I haven't played the original Half-Life, I can't say whether those were problems with the this version or if they were part of the original. Regardless, though, it's definitely worth a play.

pl0x v0lv0

This was supposed to be a revival of the original 1998 game 'Half life'. It was supposed to be a recreation of it in the newer source engine. Unfortunatly though, instead of fully utilising the power of the newer engine valve barely made use of any of the new features and the features they did incorporate eg ragdoll physics were very poorly done. It was also heavily plagued by large amounts of bugs throughout the game. This was supposed to be something amazing but unfortuantly it turned into a massive failure and the backlash from that caused multiple other valve games to not recieve remakes or the remakes were cancelled halfway through, these included team fortress classic and counter strike. Although counter strike luckily did get that proper remake, that we now call Counter Strike: Source. Luckily though for the fans of the original Half Life a proper remake was created but not by valve. Instead it was made by some very very dedicated modders, the remake was originally a free mod by the name of 'Black Mesa' but has now been made into a standalone game. Unfortunatly though the zen levels have not been remade yet but are being worked on by the team o f modders. 

I would not reccomend playing this, if you want to play half life then either you can play the original or if you want something newer then try black mesa. 

Additional Notes: I have played this all the way thorugh but my time doesnt reflect it even remotely becuase i lost my time thanks to a glitch/bug
that fucking ladder

Игра создана в далеком 1998-ом году и прошло довольно много времени от её выпуска. И в 2004 Valve решили переписать игру на их новый движок source. Уважаемые товарищи, она прекрасна, настоящий шедевр: достаточно сильный ИИ, который может вас потрепать, много закрученностей на картах, что избавляет от ощущения, что все ландшафты ужасно предсказуемы, арсенал оружия весьма впечатляет...В мире точно есть люди, которые не играли в сей проект компании Valve и они просто обязаны это сделать, это самая настоящая классика!

There isn't much of a difference between this game and the original Half-Life. If you're deciding which to buy, it honestly doesn't matter. The water is nicer in this game and there are ragdolls and better physics. Other than that, it's essentially the same game. Don't worry about not getting the "pure" experience of HL1 because this is essentially it. Lower resolution water and people who just lay down and die without leaving a ragdoll for you to smack with a crowbar weren't the cornerstones of the Half-Life. Playing HL is an experience, regardless of trivialities such as this.

I wouldn't get this by itself personally; if you really wanna pick it up, get it via one of the packs in the Store and/or wait for a sale.

One interesting note though, you can load up the content from this game in Garry's Mod. If you have Gmod, this might give you some fun stuff to play around with.
以前只是玩CS时听说过这个系列是CS的前身，虽然最近才开始接触，但这款老FPS神作依然震撼到了我：超长的流程，简洁而耐人寻味的剧情，末日求生的紧张，快节奏明了的玩法，也不乏解谜成分。你还有什么不满足的，更何况这是90年代的游戏

Здравствуйте, резко изменил свое мнение после установки русской озвучки. (хоть и неофициальной)

Игра действительно затягивает, а создан этот ремейк был, чтобы показать возможности движка Source, НО: сука, какая же кривая монтировка, Peace, Death просто. 
Ладно, в целом завезли рэгдолл, кривую монтировку и фонарь из HL2. Ну и костюм на русском. Короче, НИ ХУ Я. 

И мне интересно, почему в дате выпуска игры стоит 2004 год, тогда же вышел HL2, и в итоге: в HL2 есть русский, а в HL:S нету, только неоффициальная. А на этой озвучке слишком громкий звук выстрелов, и слишком тихий звук на голосах. Изменить нельзя. Вот и играешь на тихом, пока пиу - пиу, и добавляешь как "бла-бла-бла, Мистер Фримен". 
Плюсик лишь за 16-битный звук, ибо с русской озвучкой шпилить в HL1 - PIZ DEC.
Play the original. When you try playing a game on a physics engine it wasn't originally designed for, bad things happen.

Fue el primer juego en ser portado desde Gold Source a Source, los cambios no son de lo más increíble pero aquí vienen:

* Reflejos de los entornos y armas más detallado.
* Sombras de los entornos y NPC's más detalladas.
* Gracias a Havok, el juego goza fisicas que son simplemente decentes.
* Modificación notable de la IA del juego.

Pués eso, no hay muchas razones para comprar Half-Life: Source, es prácticamente lo mismo que Half-Life.

Si quieres jugarte toda la saga comienza por esté, es la versión mejorada y no solo por el motor, tienes mejores texturas y además acepta diversas diversas resoluciones nativas para disfrutarlo a full (el original solo da hasta 1024x768), así que si tengo compraste el pack Valve como yo aprovecha, porque este es el que vale
A graphical update, that's all. If you liked Half Life, you will enjoy this cleaner version.

I always wondered what all the hype of the Half-Life series was about. I was always curious to try them but never acted on it. When the Half-Life Complete Pack went on sale over the Holiday sale; I bought it. I was not disapointed. Half-Life 1 was so good i flew through it in two days (11 hours of gameplay). Buy it. Buy it now. You will not be disapointed.
Half life e um dos melhores jogos que joguei. Foi incrível poder finalizar novamente nessa versão com gráficos melhorados

I bought this game as is one of the best games in history. I was disappointed though that the game did not aged quite well. Maybe it was revolutionary at the time it launched, but now it can't live up as today's standards.
